name: Strategy Goo
description:
Run, and shoot, escape the goo!!

HOW TO PLAY: 

  1.  Left click on one of the members of your squad "Squaddie" or "the little blue and gray guys"
  2. Select a command from the bottom, only the first and third one work (grenade and move)
  3. Right click somewhere on the board for your squaddie to execute the command, You can reassign commands as many times as you would like and assign commands to all our squaddies
  4. Press the green checkmark to execute the commands, then the goo will take its turn
  5. Have fun, when your squaddies are all eliminated or the goo is all elimanated you win/loose, this state is represented internally.

    

Repo: https://github.com/TheFloatingBrain/StrategyGoo/tree/master

Known bugs: 

  • Crashing sometimes after loosing a squaddie, this has to do with some code I added about 30 minutes before the end, whatchya gonna do ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
  • Animations play, and in debug mode they are fine, but they play to fast to be perceivable in the release build, didnt have time to try that ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
  • Two of the buttons on the panel dont work, these are unimplemented features, see the README on github for details about standing on furniture/obstaclesto get away from the, or of course, its not a bug its a feature, for abilities being "out of your control" ;)

Still playable, I suggest hitting the green checkmark a few times to increase the difficulty. Added risk of crashing if you loose a squaddie, exponential loss of control! :P
